data.title: Cheapseat Baseball: Episode 32
data.meta_description: We watched Artie Lange's Beer League so you don't have to. It's tempting to have that be the entire episode's description, but hopefully our misery about having to watch this is amusing to all of you.  Artie Lange decided to make a movie with Ralph Macchio and a bunch of bit players from the Sopranos who all played bad Italian stereotypes.  And it had something to do with softball.  It's bad.  It's really bad.  I'm still in pain over this...
data.text:
We watched Artie Lange's Beer League so you don't have to.

It's tempting to have that be the entire episode's description, but hopefully our misery about having to watch this is amusing to all of you. Artie Lange decided to make a movie with Ralph Macchio and a bunch of bit players from the Sopranos who all played bad Italian stereotypes. And it had something to do with softball. It's bad. It's really bad. I'm still in pain over this...
